Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by Boston in 1979...
Injured on 9/6/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/7/1983 with a Bruised Hand, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/19/1985 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/24/1985 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1986, off Jay Franklin (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1986, off Victor Cruz (MIN)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1986, hitting .307 with 28 HR, 87 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1986...

Had 6 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 5/10/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1988, hitting .600 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
